alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 10:10PM CDT until April 05 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WEBB COUNTY... At 1010 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles west of Aguilares, or 16 miles southeast of Laredo, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Ranchitos Las Lomas, Aguilares and Mirando City. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 804 and 820. US Highway 83 near mile marker 734. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
